definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
erhua variant of 挨個|挨个[ai1 ge4]
a person of short stature/a short person
stupid great hulk of a man
erhua variant of 單個|单个[dan1 ge5]

sentences.english: I felt uncomfortable, and even afraid, of going out by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我很是不爽，甚至都害怕自个儿出去买东西了。

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 这片土壤太贫瘠了，想整个儿施一通肥。

sentences.english: The big dragoon was as helpless as a baby.
sentences.chinese: 这龙骑兵大个儿象婴儿似的毫无办法。

sentences.english: No one should be alone in their old age, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 谁也不该上了年纪独个儿待着，他想。

sentences.english: I was small, Asian and geeky.
sentences.chinese: 我有著亚洲人的小个儿头。

sentences.english: Battle, in order to save a little girl, big heroic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，大个儿为了救一个小女孩，壮烈牺牲了。

sentences.english: Is it at all possible that he alone can drink ten bottles of beer?
sentences.chinese: 难道他真的能独个儿饮十瓶啤酒吗？

sentences.english: I hate to see you standing about by youself in this stupid manner.
sentences.chinese: 我可不愿意看到你独个儿这么傻里傻气的站在这。

sentences.english: If you travel alone in that forest, you may run into danger.
sentences.chinese: 如果你独个儿在那片森林里行走，你会遇到危险的。

sentences.english: Like all the short guys would become receivers, right?
sentences.chinese: 就象让所有矮个儿都当外接手，对吧？

sentences.english: Other things are equal, a tall man is more respected than a short man.
sentences.chinese: 其他的条件相同的话，高个儿比矮个儿更受人尊重。

sentences.english: Other things are equal, a tall man is more respected than a short man.
sentences.chinese: 其他的条件相同的话，高个儿比矮个儿更受人尊重。

sentences.english: The big man crowded the child out of his way.
sentences.chinese: 那个大个儿将小孩挤开。

sentences.english: It's usually the big guy who's alone in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 通常是大个儿独自在角落里。

sentences.english: Do you know who that tall man is?
sentences.chinese: 您知道那个高个儿男子是谁？

sentences.english: Ross: It felt like a 'big guy' moment.

definition: a person of short stature/a short person
erhua variant of 身板[shen1 ban3]
stupid great hulk of a man
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
vigorously/to the utmost/to the best of one's ability
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
